name: Leaf Quest
description:
Aim : Help the plant to grow in various conditions. 

Description : Give love and care directly to plant, balance her warmth and water to make her grow; (The happier the plant the faster she grows) 

Keep her safe from weather and obstacles. Helping objects help to maintain the weather and help to plant to grow as soon as possible. 

At the end, break through tree tops and come out between mountains to different world with clouds and sun.
